com.mcc.ul
Class DioInfo

java.lang.Object
  com.mcc.ul.DioInfo

public class DioInfo
extends java.lang.Object

This class provides methods to retrieve information that describe the capabilities of the digital I/O subsystem on a DAQ device. To create an instance of this class, call the getInfo() method of the DaqDevice class.
